section.title: EmsSetTag
section.para: EmsSetTag applies a tag to a management system. It identifies the tag through a tag category and name.

formalpara.title: Examples
formalpara.para: The following examples demonstrate EmsSetTag usage:

example.title: EmsSetTag WSDL
example.programlisting: <message name="EmsSetTag"> <part name="emsGuid" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="category" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="name" type="xsd:string"/> </message> <message name="EmsSetTagResponse"> <part name="return" type="xsd:boolean"/> </message>
